english.segment4: I'll rise. I'll fall. I'll fail you all
english.segment5: We built these cities to stand so tall. We've lost our walls
english.segment6: I don't want to lose it, coming down. With the whole world upside-down. I don't have a soul to trust in now. With the whole world upside-down
english.segment7: We are one, tonight!. And we're singing it out!. We are one, tonight!. And we're dreaming out loud!
english.segment8: And the world is flawed. But these scars will heal
english.segment9: We are one, tonight!. Tonight!. Tonight!
english.segment10: Two eyes. One tongue. I've come. Undone
english.segment11: I'm no victim. I paid these dues. I came to lose
english.segment12: I don't want to fight about it now. With the whole world upside-down. I don't have a soul to trust in, now. With the whole world upside-down
english.segment13: We are one, tonight!. And we're singing it out!. We are one, tonight!. And we're dreaming out loud!
english.segment14: And the world is flawed. But these scars will heal
english.segment15: We are one, tonight!. Tonight!. Tonight!. Tonight!. Tonight!. Tonight!
english.segment16: I don't want to lose a common ground. With the whole world upside-down. I don't want to fight about it now. And the world was burning out
english.segment17: Let's slow the evening down. Slow it down. Slow down. Please slow down. Down. Down
english.segment19: We are one. We are one. We are one. We are one tonight. We are one tonight. And were singing it out. We are one tonight. And were dreaming out loud. And the world is flawed, But these scars will heal!.
